column1: Send him a case of coronavirus. For him and his good ole boy's.
If I die it won't be due to the coronavirus, it will be due to lack of adequate healthcare services under the UCP government.

It's not herbal medicine versus vaccination. A holistic approach means they can work together. Mint for nausea, jewelweed for rashes, and vaccines for polio, whooping cough, and coronavirus.
